member.name: T:Com.Syncfusion.Charts.StackingBarSeries
member.summary: Represents a stacked bar chart. To render this chart, create an instance of this class and add it to collection property and set the required properties.
member.remarks: StackingBarSeries is the transposed version of StackingColumnSeries. Unlike other cartesian chart types, to plot StackingBarSeries, x-axis will be rendered vertically and y-axis will be rendered horizontally. Hence, it is not possible to plot other chart types along with StackingBarSeries. Multiple StackingBarSeries can be added in a single . StackingBarSeries requires , and properties to be set to render the chart. This series also requires x-axis and y-axis to be explicitly set either using and or and .

member.name: T:Com.Syncfusion.Charts.StackingBar100Series
member.summary: Represents a 100% stacked bar chart. To render this chart, create an instance of this class and add it to collection property and set the required properties.
member.remarks: StackingBar100Series is the transposed version of StackingColumn100Series. Unlike other cartesian chart types, to plot StackingBarSeries, x-axis will be rendered vertically and y-axis will be rendered horizontally. Hence, it is not possible to plot other chart types along with StackingBarSeries. Multiple StackingBarSeries can be added in a single . StackingBarSeries requires, and properties to be set to render the chart. This series also requires x-axis and y-axis to be explicitly set either using and or and .
